item.title: Welcome to KR Theme
item.excerpt:encoded: Welcome to your KR Theme demo site!
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to KR Theme

This is a demo page showing the power and flexibility of KR Theme. Built with performance-first architecture, achieving 100/100 PageSpeed scores without caching plugins.

Features:

  • Elementor compatibility
  • WooCommerce support
  • Accessibility ready (WCAG 2.1 AA)
  • Schema.org markup
  • Extensive customization options

Perfect for blogs, businesses, portfolios, and e-commerce sites.

item.title: About Us
item.content:encoded:
About KR Theme

KR Theme is an ultra-lightweight, blazing-fast WordPress theme designed for modern websites.

We focus on:

  • Performance optimization
  • Clean, semantic HTML
  • Mobile-first responsive design
  • Accessibility standards
  • SEO best practices

Whether you're building a blog, business site, portfolio, or e-commerce platform, KR Theme provides the perfect foundation.

item.title: Getting Started with KR Theme
item.excerpt:encoded: Your guide to setting up KR Theme
item.content:encoded:
Getting Started with KR Theme

Here's everything you need to know to get started with KR Theme:

Step 1: Install and Activate

Upload the theme to your WordPress site and activate it from the Themes panel.

Step 2: Install Required Plugins

KR Theme will prompt you to install essential plugins like Redux Framework and Elementor.

Step 3: Configure Theme Options

Go to Appearance > KR Theme Options to customize your site's appearance, headers, footers, and more.

Step 4: Create Content

Use Elementor to build beautiful pages, or use the default WordPress editor for traditional posts.

Enjoy building with KR Theme!
